AzureBlade had transformed to robot mode when Hell drak had jumped 
unto Triggerhappy. When the Deceptigoon had grabbed the dragon lady, 
AzureBlade had begun to fear the worse. So, behind the enemy's back he 
had powered his plasma blade and even overpowered it. It was now so 
powerful it had drained his rifle's power. Seeing her very 
existence being in danger, the dragon slashed at Triggerhappy, aiming 
at the waist.
AzureBlade:WWAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRGGGGGHHHHHHHH!!
!!!!!!!!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Samir Duran" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Triggerhappy/Hell Drak::
> 
> Triggerhappy was hit by 2 of the energy blasts, and slightly lost 
altitude.
> 
> "Hey you-ERRGH," he yelled, as Hell Drak jumped onto the windshield.
> 
> With her good claws and talons, and being an elite bot sent down to 
Earth
> with her brother, she had a good grip, and was debating on whether 
she
> should make Triggerhappy crash, or do something else, which she 
didn't know.
> 
> "You're going down, punk!  Literally!" she yelled.
> 
> Hell Drak moved up, and fired a lazer disc at the right wing.  
Triggerhappy
> was spiraling and moving all around, but Hell Drak held on tight.
> Triggerhappy's wing was farely damaged, and now Triggerhappy had 
lost
> balance, and was now losing altitude because of lack of balance.  
Hell Drak
> was beginning to get annoyed because Lurker is failing to use 
pronouns, so I
> will use them now.  Hell Drak held onto the end, and she was trying 
to bring
> the Decepticon downwards.  If Blowpipe tried to interfere, he would 
be
> toast.  Hell Drak brought Triggerhappy down, but then, he 
transformed to
> robot mode, and so it looked like Hell Drak was humping him or 
something.
> Triggerhappy shoved her onto the ground, then he grabbed her throat, 
and put
> his gun to her head, ready to shoot......
> 
> <AzureBlade, this is your queue!>

flew

fired
